a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Taxes includes social contributions, direct and indirect taxes. Electoral democracy based on the expert assessments
and index by V-Dem, ranging from 0 to 1 (most democratic).
Data source: OWID based on V-Dem (v13); ICTD/UNU-WIDER Government Revenue Dataset, August 2021
